name: nodewebpage
description: SERVICIO API PARA WEBPAGE 2.0 DE EMPRESA COMBEX-IM

scripts.prod: set NODE_ENV=production&& SET UV_THREADPOOL_SIZE=10 && nodemon src/index.js
scripts.dev: set NODE_ENV=development&& SET UV_THREADPOOL_SIZE=10 && nodemon src/index.js
scripts.linux: export NODE_ENV=production && export UV_THREADPOOL_SIZE=10 && nodemon src/index.js

author: FERNANDO MONTERROSO
